greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of cyclic group factors in the total decomposition of the abelian non-cyclic group (Z/A033949(n) Z)^x. Row lengths of A281854.
comment: A046072 the decompositions used are not total, e.g., n = 6 with A033949(6) = 1 uses  C_6, but C_6 = C_2 x C_3. Or, 21 = A033949(6), A046072(21) = 2 not 3 = a(6).
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Mar 03 2017
